name: Darth Vader

name: Jawas
about: Jawas were easily identifiable by their traditional brown hooded robes, though it was not unheard of for them to wear other colors. Other notable features included their glowing yellow eyes, small stature and high pitched, quickly spoken language called Jawaese.

name: Tusken Raider
about: Tusken Raiders were a species native to the desert world of Tatooine. Their homeworld's harsh environment resulted in them being extremely xenophobic and territorial of their native resources, often attacking the outskirts of smaller settlements such as Anchorhead. They viewed themselves as Tatooine's rightful inhabitants, and all non-native species as trespassers.

name: Momaw Nadon / Hammerhead
about: Momaw Nadon, who also started to be referred to as hammerhead at some point, hailed from the planet Ithor, until he was exiled as punishment for revealing his species' agricultural secrets to the Galactic Empire in order to save Ithor. Spending his exile on the desert world of Tatooine, Nadon maintained a small secret garden in the mountains south of the planet's Mos Eisley spaceport.
